source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.
source_objects.title: 3D & Animation

items.title: Create 3D Parallax Video Slideshow Easily in After Effects!
items.headline: A step by step course; creating 3D Parallax Slideshow using Adobe After Effects -  After Effects Project File Included
objectives_summary: LEARN the techniques which you could then build on and create your own 3D Parallax Slideshows style using Adobe After Effects .
CREATE 3D Parallax Photo Slideshow Easily using Adobe After Effects .
TURN your simple 2D still images into an amazing moving 3D storytelling slideshow .

items.title: Exterior Visualization in Blender 2.9
items.headline: Use the Blender to Create Breathtaking Exterior Renders.
objectives_summary: Modelling, Shading, Lighting, Rendering in Blender
Photorealistic Exterior Rendering in Blender
Composting, Editing Final Renders

items.title: Master Blueprints in Unreal Engine 4 - Endless Runner
items.headline: Learn  how to develop Blueprints  to quickly create your own awesome next generation games using the brilliant UE4
objectives_summary: Characters
Player Movement
Cameras

items.title: Learn Object Animation in Blender 2.8 - The Ultimate Guide
items.headline: Learn All About Object Animation in Blender
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to animate various objects for their animations including: Animating an Ocean, Lamp, Chain Rolling up, fluid, Crack in the floor & much more!

items.title: Create a 2d animated film from concept to production
items.headline: t's the entire 2d cartoon process from character concepts to rigging and final stages of production
objectives_summary: you will be able to develop fully functional 2d character rigs, create animatics, add audio and sound effects to enhance your films, make sceneries and backgrounds, and basically become a functional 1 person animation studio with top industry quality know how.

items.title: Hands On 3D CAD MODELLING Solidworks Course
items.headline: Learn Sketching, Part Modelling, Assembly, Drawings, Rendering, Animation and Modelling From Photographs
objectives_summary: After completing this course you will be able to confidently produce complex 3D CAD models
Be ready to employ your skills in real industry environment
Understand Solidworks in wider context by creating a product from a sketch to video animation

items.title: Animation Workout
items.headline: The fast and effective way to learn the principles of 2D animation
objectives_summary: A solid understanding of the fundamentals of animation.
Create simple animations that use the core principles such as: squash & stretch and drag & overlap.
Hand draw animations frame by frame to fully understand movement.

items.title: Motion Graphics 2020: Animate Illustration in After Effects
items.headline: Starting creating your own motion graphics, 2d animation, animated illustrations in Adobe After Effects in just minutes.
objectives_summary: Animate stunning motion graphics videos on your own
Improve your animation with animation principles and curves
Use hottest professional techniques to improve workflow and be more efficient

items.title: Learn Sculpting in Pixelogics ZBrush Create a Micro Organism
items.headline: Learn Zbrushes main tools in this fantastic Zbrush Scultping course and Create a Micro Organism Explore your Potential
objectives_summary: Sculpt Organic Models and Creatures
Understand the uses for Dynamesh
Project high level details onto different subtools

items.title: 3D Character Creation in Cinema 4D: Modeling a Happy Monster
items.headline: Learn to model, sculpt, texture and render beautiful 3D characters in Cinema 4D. Poly modeling C4D course.
objectives_summary: Model beatutiful and cool looking 3D cartoony monster.
Understand the character modeling pipeline in Cinema 4D.
Create 3D objects and characters that are animation friendly.

items.title: VRay Portfolio Workshop
items.headline: Learn Advanced VRay Interior Lighting & Rendering
objectives_summary: PRO Lighting techniques for producing interior scene with exterior open roof
Different VRay Material Setups and VRay Material Library
Post Production methods for creating photorealistic renderings

items.title: Design a Working Light Bulb - Fusion 360 for 3D Printing
items.headline: Learn valuable modeling techniques while going through the entire workflow from design to 3D printing.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course students will feel more confident in their design skills in Fusion 360 and in the entire workflow of going from design to 3D printed part.

items.title: Surfacing with Rhino V7 using Subdivision and NURBS surfaces
items.headline: Level 1 & Level 2
objectives_summary: Learn to use Rhino V7 through a hands on type of project.
You will learn to use Rhino's latest toolsets mainly subdivision surfacing as well as use Rhino's NURBS tools

items.title: Character Modeling and Sculpting in Zbrush

items.headline: Jump into 3D Game Development and Learn Character Sculpting in Zbrush with this Complete Beginner Course!
objectives_summary: You will become confident using Zbrush to model and sculpt your own characters, props and other 3D assets
You will learn the professional workflow of sculpting a 3D character for use in gaming and movies
You will learn all of the Zbrush tools necessary to create your own characters

items.title: 3ds max and Vray advanced course. Furniture modeling.
items.headline: All modeling tricks in one course for architectural 3d visualizer
objectives_summary: Make 3d models of any complexity
Take this course if you want to enhance your 3ds max skills
Take thsi course if you want become profeccinal architectural visualizer
